SEARCH
Package fr.insalyon.model

Class TimeWindow

java.lang.Object
fr.insalyon.model.TimeWindow
public class TimeWindow extends Object
A one-hour time interval during which a courier can make a delivery.
It uses a multiton pattern to create all the instances and deliver it
See Also:
  • Delivery
  • Courier
